docs.text: Excel (XLS) Python scripts to format Veracode XML results into Excel workbook formats for easier human consumption. SCA Extractor Creates a CSV file with open source vulnerability (SCA) findings for all builds in the input file. VeraCustomTriage App that generates a .xlsx remediation plan from a set of scan results augmented with text from JSON configuration files. Custom text is added when flaw criteria is met (such as a CWE ID, module name, file or line number). This allows custom text such as internal workflows, wiki links, training, code snippets, 2nd party information or other languages into the auto generated remediation plan. Enables app sec teams to triage large volumes of flaws quickly whilst sharing a core advice repository in code. Veracode Report Converter (CSV) .NET Framework utility to extract useful data from Detailed Report XML file into CSV format Veracode Report Converter - Portable (CSV) .NET Core utility to extract useful data from Detailed Report XML file into CSV format veracode-to-csv This script outputs one CSV file per scan per application profile visible in a Veracode platform account. The output can be imported into Splunk for further analysis.

docs.text: API Wrappers These are open source examples that wrap the Veracode XML and REST APIs. Python veracode-python A python wrapper for communicating with the Veracode APIs. veracode-api-py Python helper library for working with the Veracode APIs. Handles retries, pagination, and other features of the modern Veracode REST APIs. veracode-api-clients Client code using the Veracode REST and XML APIs. Includes handlers for Veracode Dynamic Analysis scanning. Java veracode-platform-api-framework (Java) Several project that allow for processing of Veracode XML API data through calls with similar objects and functionality. dotnet (.NET) .NET Core (NuGet Package) C# NuGet package that wraps XML and REST APIs Go Go Wrapper written in Go for easy use of Veracode APIs Node node-veracode-api-client Node.js API client. Ruby veracode-api (Ruby) Ruby Wrapper for the Veracode API. Powershell PowerShell PowerShell script for pushing binaries to Veracode using Java API. PHP veracode-quick-scan PHP example of how to connect to the APIs, scan a couple of files and get results. Bash Bash A shell script to upload and scan a application (zip or war etc.) and create the application if necessary. Uses Curl and hmac headers. Bash shell Bash script for scanning a directory of code with the Veracode platform.

docs.text: HMAC Signing The Veracode APIs require a HMAC at part of the HTTP payload, these are example implementations for different languages. vcodeHMAC Go package that creates an authorization header using Veracode API Key and ID. PythonHMAC simple example of usage of the Veracode API signing library provided in the Veracode Help Center veracode-go-hmac-authentication A simple Go package that follows the format of the existing HMAC Authentication Examples found in the Veracode Help Center. Veracode_HMAC_Auth A PowerShell example for doing HMAC authentication to the Veracode APIs. auth.js Veracode custom HMAC request signing algorithm (used for API authorization), written in JavaScript -- uses Web Crypto API instead of the Node Crypto library Curl Short article illustrating use of built-in shell tools to handle HMAC signing and send API requests from the command line.

docs.text: Veracode Delete Sandbox A simple example script to delete a Sandbox if it exists in a Veracode application profile and you have the appropriate permissions. Check Build Status Script to check if an application profile in Veracode has a build running currently. Veracode API Credentials Expiry A simple example to get the exiration dates of api credentials for your users. VcodeAutoMitigate Command line app that mitigates flaws in Veracode based on CWE, scan type, and specific text in the description. VcodeMitigationExpire Utility designed to be run on a regular cadence (e.g., weekly cron job) to expire mitigations. The types of mitigations, expiration references, and other settings are controlled in a JSON config file. Veracode Break the Build by Severity This project contains three python scripts useful for working with Veracode projects in a build pipeline to break the build if any findings of a given severity or higher are found. Veracode BCA Builder Shell script to generate the BCA package to scan an iOS app. Veracode Sandbox Mitigated Unique Findings This script will pull all open findings across all sandboxes for all applications and calculate which mitigated (proposed, accepted, or rejected) findings only exist in a single sandbox, and therefore may be deleted when the sandbox is deleted. Veracode Mitigation Copier This script will pull all open findings across all sandboxes for all applications and calculate which mitigated (proposed, accepted, or rejected) findings only exist in a single sandbox, and therefore may be deleted when the sandbox is deleted. Veracode User Bulk Role Assign This script will pull all open findings across all sandboxes for all applications and calculate which mitigated (proposed, accepted, or rejected) findings only exist in a single sandbox, and therefore may be deleted when the sandbox is deleted. Veracode Workspace Auto Create This script will pull all open findings across all sandboxes for all applications and calculate which mitigated (proposed, accepted, or rejected) findings only exist in a single sandbox, and therefore may be deleted when the sandbox is deleted.
